statements: ADVISE SELECT t_1.int_field1 , t_1.decimal_field1 , t_1.primary_key_id , t_1.bool_field1 FROM bucket_01 t_1 INNER JOIN bucket_04 t_4 ON ( t_1.primary_key_id = t_4.primary_key_id ) INNER JOIN bucket_04 t_5 ON ( t_1.primary_key_id = t_5.primary_key_id)
